LanguageData.PegDick.label: peg dick
LanguageData.PegDick.description: A wooden dildo designed to replace a missing penis. Be careful of splinters.
LanguageData.HydraulicPenis.label: hydraulic penis
LanguageData.HydraulicPenis.description: A prosthetic penis. Cold metal phallus. Has built in fluid delivery system.
LanguageData.HydraulicVagina.label: hydraulic vagina
LanguageData.HydraulicVagina.description: A prosthetic vagina. Its cold metal grip is uncomfortable but it has great suction power.
LanguageData.HydraulicBreasts.label: hydraulic breasts
LanguageData.HydraulicBreasts.description: Prosthetic breasts. Conical metal with increased pumping action, spray your friends.

LanguageData.BionicPenis.label: bionic penis
LanguageData.BionicPenis.description: A high-tech prosthetic penis. Features include: - Adjustable size allows you to fit in any vagina. - Over 50 different vibration modes, including 10 of the most stimulating waveforms known to science - State-of-the-art neural interface activates neural pathways you didn't even know you had to make you feel things you never even imagined.
LanguageData.BionicVagina.label: bionic vagina
LanguageData.BionicVagina.description: A high-tech prosthetic vagina. Features include: - Interior lined with 150 million micro-g-spots - Resizes to fit any penis - Auto-lubrication with boro-graphitic pseudofluid, smooth but never slimy (includes toggleable sliminess in case you're into that)
LanguageData.BionicBreasts.label: bionic breasts
LanguageData.BionicBreasts.description: High-tech prosthetic breasts. Features include: - Resizes to any desired size
LanguageData.BionicAnus.label: bionic anus
LanguageData.BionicAnus.description: A high-tech prosthetic anus. Features include: - Resizes to any desired size - Auto-lubrication with boro-graphitic pseudofluid, smooth but never slimy (includes toggleable sliminess in case you're into that)
